query:
WITH ins_scope AS (
            INSERT INTO scopes (scope, creator, description) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
            RETURNING
            scope,
            description,
            creator,
            package_limit,
            new_package_per_week_limit,
            publish_attempts_per_week_limit,
            verify_oidc_actor,
            require_publishing_from_ci,
            updated_at,
            created_at
        ),
        ins_member AS (
            INSERT INTO scope_members (scope, user_id, is_admin)
            VALUES ($1, $2, true)
        )
        SELECT
        scope as "scope: ScopeName",
        description as "description: ScopeDescription",
        creator,
        package_limit,
        new_package_per_week_limit,
        publish_attempts_per_week_limit,
        verify_oidc_actor,
        require_publishing_from_ci,
        updated_at,
        created_at
        FROM ins_scope
